song.title: Come Now Is The Time To Worship (C to A)

notes.contents:
Lead: Rodger
Melody: Iris (boost during last half of the song after we modulate in key of A)
Harmony: Kristina

songs.description:
Miracle: CCLI Song # 7118762
All Hail King Jesus: CCLI Song # 7097216

notes.contents:
Lead: Kristina
Instrumental V1 chords during MC Hosts speaking
Intro
V1 - Kristina
Chorus - Kristina
Turnaround
V2 - All (uni)
Chorus - All (harms)
Bridge
(2X) All Hail King Jesus Chorus 1A (harms)
(1X) All Hail King Jesus Chorus 1B
Turnaround
V3 - Kristina (first 2 lines) / (last 2 lines all in - harms)
(2X) All Hail King Jesus Chorus 1A (harms)
(1X) All Hail King Jesus Chorus 1B

song.title: How Deep The Father's Love For Us / He Lives (B)

songs.description:
How Deep The Father's Love For Us: CCLI Song # 1558110
He Lives: CCLI Song # 7133098

notes.contents:
Lead: Iris / Harmony: Kristina
Instrumental V1 of What a Beautiful Name during communion
V1 - Iris & Rodger
Turnaround
V2 - All (harms)
Turnaround
V3 - All (harms)
(2X) He Lives - Chorus - All (harms)
He Lives (Instrumental)
(2X) He Lives Bridge  - All (harms)
(2X) He Lives - Chorus - All (harms)
He Lives (Instrumental)
V1 - Iris & Rodger
Stay on B to transition to What a Beautiful Name

Bridge 2 - All (harms)

Chorus 1 - Kristina
last line tag 2X - Kristina
